What to say immediately following the Wi.ARABIC_TEXT: ((سُبْحَانَ المَلِكِ القُدُّوسِ)) ثلاثَ مرَّاتٍ والثَّالِثَةُ يَجْهَرُ بها ويَمُدُّ بها صَوتَهُ يقولُ: [رَبِّ الْمَلاَئِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ])).
What to say immediately following the Wi.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Subhanal-malikil-quddoos.(three times).on the third time he would raise his voice, elongate it and add: (Rabbil-mala-ikati warrooh.))
What to say immediately following the Wi.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (How perfect The King, The Holy One is.(three times) on the third time he would raise his voice, elongate it and add: (Lord of the angles and the Rooh (i.e. Jibra-eel).))
